p: (1) Hematological Examinations. These examinations were performed using the SYSMEX KX 21N automaton using the method used by Sodipo et al. [ 47]. These examinations included red and white blood cell counts, hemoglobin level, hematocrit, mean globular volume (MGV), mean corpuscular hemoglobin content (MCH), and determination of mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration (MCHC).
